document_data.name: Winding Way
document_data.mainbody: The '''Winding Way''' was a tavern located in the center of [[Soubar]] in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.History: The tavern was also the home of [[Mag]], a mysterious woman who owned the bar around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Geography: The Winding Way was located by the ruins of the old temple or abbey of [[Bane]] that was the heart of the village.
